subject: Re: [junit] Re: How to test private methods in a class.
msgSnippet: May I make a meta-suggestion? I think the trenches have been pretty firmly dug on this thread, and little more can be done to shed actual light on either
messageBody:
May I make a meta-suggestion?

I think the trenches have been pretty firmly dug on this thread, and
little more can be done to shed actual light on either side's position.
How about a three-day truce (until 10 September) in which no one posts
about this topic. After that, anyone is welcome to restart the discussion.

David Saff
